title: Remove 'Brotherhood of Copper' banner image from Home Page hero

requirements.summary: Remove the Home Page hero banner image that references the generated 'brotherhood of copper banner.png' while keeping the hero layout balanced on mobile and desktop.
acceptanceCriteria: Home Page no longer renders an whose src is `/assets/generated/brotherhood of copper banner.png`.
The hero section content (icon, title, description, CTAs) remains centered and visually well-spaced on both mobile and desktop after removal.
No other pages/components are modified as part of this change.

file_operations.description: Delete the banner block that references `/assets/generated/brotherhood of copper banner.png` from the hero section, and adjust surrounding spacing classes (e.g., margins/padding around the icon/title group) so the hero remains centered and visually balanced on mobile and desktop without introducing changes to any other files.
